spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent spatial preservation and room adjacency. Door and window placements are highly accurate to the source material. Minor deduction for slight scaling exaggeration in the central hallway width.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. Roof is removed, all rooms are present without hallucinations, and the model is presented as a floating entity on a neutral background with no UI or text.

furniture_mapping.notes: Highly accurate placement of specific blocks (beds, L-sofa, dining set, radiators). Minor deduction as the living room entertainment console is slightly simplified compared to the plan detail.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Complies perfectly with low-poly, non-photorealistic requirements. Isometric angle is correct. Deduction of 2 points for subtle gradient shadows which technically lean away from purely 'flat' shading.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in central hall width relative to room proportions.
